title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 25 - Records And Reports By Milk Dealers-official Order No. 130-
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 25 - Records And Reports By Milk Dealers-official Order No. 130-
State Regulations
§ 25.1 - Information required of milk dealers
§ 25.2 - Accurate record of milk from producers
§ 25.3 - Monthly reports to division of dairy industry services
§ 25.4 - Statement of receipt to producers
§ 25.5 - Immediate statement on tests to producers
§ 25.6 - Payment statement to producers
§ 25.7 - Annual financial reports
§ 25.8 - Availability and retention of records
§ 25.9 - Requirements in addition to those of other orders
§ 25.10 - Disclosure of milk dealer financial statements
§ 25.11 to 25.12 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 25

Statutory authority: Agriculture and Markets Law, §255

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
